question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-model/src/builder/macros.rs] [Function: expand_assert()] [Abort code collision] Can an attacker craft a custom abort code in two-argument assert! that collides with UNSPECIFIED_ABORT_CODE or other well-known abort codes, causing error handling confusion or bypass?
